questions.label: Any Adverse reaction while patients was on Treatment:

answers.label: Skin rash with or without Itching
Stop anti-TB drugs and refer to the Medical Officer
Stop ethambutol and refer to the Medical Officer
Stop rifampicin and refer to the Medical Officer
Give drugs with small meals or just before bedtime
Advise patient to swallow pills slowly with small sips of water
Advise patient to swallow pills slowly with small sips of water ; If symptoms persist or worsen refer to hospital
Reassure and counsel patients before starting treatment and encourage increase fluid intake
Change intermittent to daily rifampicin administration
